item.title: Delta OS
item.description: This documentation helps you learn about Delta OS and how to run it on your PC. About Delta OS is an Arch based distribution created for developers and people intrested in Arch Linux. It is created by the Delta OS team which is led by Mr. Apurba Adhikari. Due to Arch Linux having good amount of learning curve and a complex installation procedure, Delta OS tries to simplify it and brings a bit user friendly and beautiful interface giving almost same Arch experience.
